results.title: Build your first end-to-end test with Playwright - Training
results.description: Build your first end-to-end test with Playwright Beginner Developer Microsoft Playwright Testing Visual Studio Code In this module, you'll learn how to use Playwright to test a sample web application. Add Prerequisites To get started with Playwright, you should have: Visual Studio Code installed Latest version of node Latest version of npm.

results.title: What is Playwright Workspaces? - Playwright Workspaces
results.description: What is Playwright Workspaces. Playwright Workspaces is a fully managed service for end-to-end web testing, built on top of Playwright. With Playwright Workspaces, you can significantly speed up test execution by running tests in parallel using managed cloud-based browsers. The service takes care of the underlying infrastructure and complexity,.

results.title: What is Microsoft Playwright Testing? - Microsoft Playwright Testing
results.description: Important Microsoft Playwright Testing will be retired on March 8, 2026.  ...t Workspace in Azure App Testing, now generally availableMicrosoft Playwright Testing Preview is a fully managed service for end-to-end testing built on top of Playwright. With Playwright, you can automate end-to-end tests to ensure your web applications work the way you.
